## Voice.Listener.CallInviteAccepted type

Call invite accepted event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.CallInviteAccepted](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type CallInviteAccepted = (callInvite: CallInvite, call: Call) => void;
```
